Award-Winning Fabric Softener: The ultimate in laundry softener with our wool dryer balls. Designed to replace traditional dryer sheets, offering a natural and effective way to soften your clothes.

body.description: Experience the premium quality of our award-winning, 100% all-natural, New Zealand Wool Dryer Balls. This 6-pack of XL wool laundry balls is the ultimate in laundry supplies, offering an eco-friendly alternative to traditional fabric softeners like Downy or Bounce dryer sheets. Our wool balls have been carefully crafted to not only soften your fabrics but also to reduce drying time, making them a cost-effective solution for your laundry needs. Our Wool Balls for Dryer are an essential addition to your newborn essentials. They are organic and hypoallergenic, making them safe for the most delicate baby clothes. As reusable dryer balls, they are a sustainable solution contributing to a greener planet. One of the unique features of our wool dryer balls is their effectiveness in pet hair removal. Your furry friend's hair can be a nuisance, but worry no more. Our dryer balls laundry reusable pet hair feature ensures your clothes come out clean and hair-free. These wool laundry balls for dryer are versatile and can replace your usual laundry softener. Just add a few drops of your favorite essential oil to our wool balls, and enjoy the fresh and clean scent on your clothes. Our wool dryer balls are not ordinary; they are organic wool dryer balls sourced from New Zealand, known for its high-quality wool. Our wool balls for dryer also help reduce static, so no more annoying clingy clothes. From woolen dryer balls to wool dryer balls organic or even dryer balls wool, our product is simply unmatched. These wool balls for laundry are your perfect companion, whether you're a busy mom, a hardworking wife, or a meticulous home maker. Do you want the best wool dryer balls? Subscribe and save with our wool dryer balls 6 pack and transform your laundry routine into an eco-friendly practice. So why wait?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: What I like the most is that I no longer need to use a dryer sheet that adds chemicals to my clothes, and that I’m saving money on buying dryer sheets. I have used essential oils, putting a few drops onto these dryer balls to add some delicious, yet subtle scent to my laundry. (Lavender oil for linens, Lemon oil for stinky clothes, like workout pants and shirts and a refreshing Peppermint oil for… well why not!) I can add whatever scent I want and I know it all natural. My clothes come out of the dryer just as soft and fresh as they did when using the dryer sheets.I would recommend to anyone wanting to save money on their laundry bill. My only regret is that I didn’t invest in these sooner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They sure work for me!
reviews.reviewText: Was skeptical of wool dryer balls when I first tried them, but am SOLD! I love that they have no scent, as in no artificial flower chemical scent! Have been using wool dryer balls for quite some time now. Replaced my first set (don’t know original manufacturer) with these. They seem very dense which makes me think they’ll last a long while. I seriously feel they help with static cling. Doesn’t eliminate it (does anything?) but sure helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased these when I bought my new washer/dryer set. Use on every load. Not everything comes out 100% static free, but for the most part they work. I use 4 on every load but thinking I should oukd put all 6 in. Overall I'm still happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems like they work
reviews.reviewText: Seems like they do make cloths a little softer. But that could shorten the life span of cloths too

reviews.reviewerName: I'm 6'3" in an xl and it fit perfectly as described. A+
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As described, work great!
reviews.reviewText: As described, work great. Clothes seem to dry faster and no noticeable static.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Serves the purpose
reviews.reviewText: Not having used dryer balls before I was curious to see how effective they would be for replacing fabric softener. They did a decent job with the general laundry. Towels were not as fluffy as when the liquid fabric softener was used. There was an occasional slight amount of static when i was removing clothes from the dryer. Appreciate that they are hypoallergenic. and fragrance free. Because of the location of my dryer, I can hear the ball bouncing around in the dryer. Definitely cost effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wool balls really do replace dryer sheets. I’ve used these the last few years and I’m highly impressed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Did a test, & the laundry with the balls are more fluffy than the laundry without the balls...my picture didn't go through but the ones with the balls were 3 inches fluffier
